item.title: TileCache is very slow
item.description:
From steffen....@gmail.com on October 28, 2011 12:19:58
When the TileCache is used a lot, many tiny files are generated. This slows down the loading a lot. Possible solutions: Use a hierarchy of directories so that a directory only contains around 100-1000 files. Use Pack them all together in large files.
When I have time I will look into this myself sometime.
Attachment: Bildschirmfoto am 2011-10-28 12:13:33.png
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=198

item.contents:
From steffen....@gmail.com on October 31, 2011 12:23:06
The numbers are from a Huawei Ideos X3 (600mhz, 265MB RAM) using a 8GB Class 2 MicroSD. I'm from a university project developing our own route planing service. Map rendering became very slow i.e. start up time was very bad. Deleting the cache solved the problem.
I will try to replicate the problem and get better numbers as soon as I have time.

From thilo.mu...@gmail.com on December 18, 2011 14:43:55
Regarding your request for a new release, please read my comment here: https://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=214#c3 I am closing this issue now on request of the original reporter, assuming that the problem is fixed.
